room.label: library
room.title: The vast library
room.description: This looks to be a library. There are numerous shelves throughout the room. Mysteriously there is a fire raging in the fireplace. I guess someone was just here..

activities.label: desk
activities.title: : A desk
activities.description: There is a computer sitting on the desk. It does not seem to work. There is a bunch of paperwork scattered all over the desk.

activities.label: bookcase
activities.title: : A bookcase full of books
activities.description: This book case has a lot of books on it.

activities.label: endtable
activities.title: : An endtable
activities.description: End table by the chair in front of the fire. There is a book that looks rather strange sitting on it
